title: DiversityOne A Multi-Country Smartphone Sensor Dataset for Everyday Life Behavior Modeling.pdf
abstract: Towards this goal, previous studies have relied on datasets combining passive sensor data with human-provided annotations or self-reports. However, many existing datasets are limited in scope, often focusing on specific countries primarily in the Global North, involving a small number of participants, or using a limited range of pre-processed sensors.
